attributes.action: Campaign against the notion that Tony Blair should be the first President of Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned consider that Tony Blair has lost the trust of the British people.  If Tony Blair is nominated as the first President of the European Council under the EU treaty then the Prime Minister should vote against this motion and lobby other European Countries to do likewise.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister does not lead "campaigns", and the situation you refer to is at present entirely hypothetical. Naturally this could change in the future and the petition might then be appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
